title: Cant switch from ENGLISH to KOREAN in the logs anymore since the new client
body: Before this new client I went to the notepad that said "en_US" and switched it to the korean one, but if I do that now when i open up league it pops an error every time now without doing the small install it used to do.

replies.body:
This happens 100% of the time on the new client if you change your language to one that is *not supported* on your region. I'm not sure if this intended or if there is a plan to support other languages on NA in the future. To resolve this, you'll need to go back and revert the changes you made to those locale files.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Will it ever be supported though? Whats wrong with changing the language on your client? It's not like I'm trying to change the server.

I don't know if other languages will be supported on NA since I'm not on the team that develops the new client. In the past (on the old client) we've seen a lot of things break as a result of changing your language to one that isn't supported on your region, so unless something changed with the new client, there's not a great chance that other languages will be supported.
Oh, okay. Thanks for clearing it up for me. Have a good day!
Have the exact same problem T T
